channel.title: Diego W. Antunes
channel.description: Recent content on Diego W. Antunes

item.title: Warm-up
item.description: Warm-up with Kubernetes PodCast I’m really trying to come up with some useful for me and for others. I’m working on an Ansible post but before that I will remove the rust and warm-up. I’ve been working with Kubernetes for the past 2-3 years and one thing that I like about it is that you can find a lot of resources on the web. The documentation is good and you can even help with the translation to other languages besides English.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a software engineer and I’ve been playing with computers for a long time. I love creating things, software most of the time but I have also created some hardware a few years ago. Thanks for reading!

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can find me at @diegowa on twitter. Email devlware or diego.
